definition[0]: the power to decide whether or how to do something
example[0]: She has the final word on whether policies are put into action or not.
example[1]: The final word on policy determination belongs to the committee.
definition[1]: the last statement or speech in a discussion or argument
example[2]: The last word must go to Nick, who has organized the whole project.
example[3]: Why must you always have the last word in any argument?
definition[2]: in sports, the last hit or kick in a game, especially when it is successful
example[4]: Adams had the final word with a last-minute goal.
